message.name: ERR_BANK_XRV_AT_LEAST_ONE_ACTIVE_ACCOUNT
message.locale: You cannot cancel this bank because it contains active accounts.

message.name: ERR_BANK_XFV_REOPENING_BANK_REMOVE_END_DATE
message.locale: If you want to reopen this bank then you must remove the end date.

message.name: ERR_BANK_XRV_START_DATE_AFTER_BRANCH_START
message.locale: You cannot set the start date to "%1d" as this is after the start date of at least one bank branch

message.name: ERR_BANK_XRV_END_DATE_BEFORE_BRANCH_START
message.locale: You cannot set the end date to "%1d" as this is after the start date of at least one bank branch

message.name: ERR_BANK_XRV_END_DATE_BEFORE_BRANCH_END
message.locale: You cannot set the end date to "%1d" as this is before the end date of at least one bank branch
